key_risks: Profitability challenges due to declining gross profit margins and rising operating expenses
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on SMBs vulnerable to downturns
Intense competition from Amazon, WooCommerce, and other e-commerce platforms
Data privacy and security concerns, including GDPR and CCPA compliance
Dependence on third-party apps introducing reliability and security risks
Post-pandemic slowdown in growth as consumer behavior normalizes
Legal issues, including a $60 million lawsuit from Redline Steel
controversies: Layoffs affecting 20% of the workforce in 2022 and 2023
$60 million lawsuit from Redline Steel over alleged technical failures
social_issues: Layoffs and restructuring raising concerns about corporate culture and employee morale
governance_issues: Leadership concerns due to overexpansion during the pandemic and subsequent layoffs
